column4: I have Ubuntu 9.04 for a 32 bits pc. What is better from me download deb or rpm to install any program?

open synaptic on the linux computer.. then mark the packages you want to install.. then search the menus.. there is a export download script somewhere.. save that script on a usb stick and run it from the windows computer..
you need to download a copy of wget and put it on the flash drive too..
